## FluxScriptInvocationAPI.(constructor)

Creates FluxScriptInvocationAPI with the supplied InfluxDB instance and a particular script identifier.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(influxDB: InfluxDB, options?: ExecutionOptions);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  influxDB | InfluxDB | an instance that knows how to communicate with InfluxDB server |
|  options | ExecutionOptions | <i>(Optional)</i> script execution options |
